title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning-Based Integrated Pharmacy Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate collaborative problem-solving competencies by analyzing real pharmaceutical cases through role-assigned methods.
Learners achieve a knowledge-construction level of 80% or higher in a computer-assisted learning environment.
Learners apply a systematic case study process to achieve integrated pharmaceutical education objectives.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
